title: Font Finder ðŸ”Ž by What Font Is
introduction: What Font Is is a font finder tool that helps users identify fonts from images. Users can upload an image of the text containing the font they need to identify, and the system uses advanced AI to find the font in 90% of cases.
features: Upload images of text to identify fonts
Advanced AI technology for font identification
Shows over 60 similar fonts with download or purchase links

faqs.question: What types of images work best for font identification?
faqs.answer: Clean images with clear text work best for font identification. Low quality images may result in inaccuracies.

faqs.question: How many fonts are shown for identification?
faqs.answer: Over 60 fonts similar to the one in the uploaded image are shown for identification.
